name: LeapFrog (billyli)
description:
Hello, I am Billy. 

This is my 2-week game project, LeapFrog. 

It's a 2D platform game with attack, jump, dash, and more features. 

The player would play as a ninja frog to slice their way through the enemies and reach the goal. Enjoy! 

Control: 

WASD, J, K, R
